si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: The US dollar sales price was Rs 296.8300 and the purchase price was Rs 306.442, based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Wednesday (May 29).

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar sales price was Rs 296.8300 and the purchase price was Rs 306.442, based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Wednesday (May 29).

summary_lines: The US dollar's selling price is Rs 296.8300, while its buying price is Rs 306.442 according to the Central Bank's latest update on May 29.
